## Suggested Social Activity

Monday: [Arlington and Happy Hour at Hurricane Grill and Wings](https://locations.hurricanewings.com/ll/US/NY/Poughkeepsie/9-Raymond-Avenue)

Tuesday: Stroll above the Hudson at [Walkway Over the Hudson](https://walkway.org/) 

Wednesday: Explore [Vassar's Ecological Preserve](https://www.vassar.edu/preserve)

Thursday: Late Night 5-7pm at [The Loeb](https://www.vassar.edu/theloeb) 

    - Regular exhibitions
    - Uluso "Against the Dark Night Sky"
    - Ubuhle Women: Beedwork and the Art of Independence

Friday \& weekend: [Vassar's Powerhouse Theater](https://www.vassar.edu/powerhouse)

    - Friday 6pm "We Are Gathered Together"
    - Saturday \& Sunday 8pm "Messy White Gays"
    - Saturday \& Sunday 7pm "The Taming of the Shrew"

Slack channel `#social`

## Photo Day

Thursday afternoon we will have a photographer come in from Communications to take our photo as a group and do some small interviews.


## Social Media

Please put a big cross mark on your name tag to indicate that you do not want to be photographed/your photo to be shared. 
Otherwise we/other participants will assume you are ok with being photographed and your photo being shared. 

If you share any photos/news/comments on social media feel free to use `#BayesBATS`.
